Esper IO API

This documentation concentrates upon the Esper IO API. The most significant classes and interfaces are:
  • AdapterInputSource
  • CSVInputAdapter
  • CSVInputAdapterSpec

    • Full Esper documentation may be found at esper.codehaus.org.
